title: 2b. JSON Editing Rules (IMPORTANT!)
description: Critical syntax rules to avoid breaking the website
searchText: 2b. json editing rules (important!) critical syntax rules to avoid breaking the website

title: "text": "value",
description: ‚úÖ CORRECT: Use double quotes, comma after each item
searchText: "text": "value", ‚úÖ correct: use double quotes, comma after each item

title: "text": "value"
description: ‚úÖ CORRECT: NO comma on the LAST item in a list
searchText: "text": "value" ‚úÖ correct: no comma on the last item in a list

title: 'text': 'value',
description: ‚ùå WRONG: Never use single quotes in JSON
searchText: 'text': 'value', ‚ùå wrong: never use single quotes in json

title: "visible": true
description: ‚úÖ CORRECT: true/false (no quotes for booleans)
searchText: "visible": true ‚úÖ correct: true/false (no quotes for booleans)

title: "visible": "true"
description: ‚ùå WRONG: Don't put quotes around true/false
searchText: "visible": "true" ‚ùå wrong: don't put quotes around true/false

title: Check JSON syntax
description: üí° TIP: Dreamweaver shows red errors if JSON syntax is wrong
searchText: check json syntax üí° tip: dreamweaver shows red errors if json syntax is wrong

title: 2c. JSON File Format Guide
description: Understanding the structure and format of JSON files for website content
searchText: 2c. json file format guide understanding the structure and format of json files for website content

title: Basic JSON Structure
description: JSON files contain data in key-value pairs enclosed in curly braces { }
searchText: basic json structure json files contain data in key-value pairs enclosed in curly braces { }

title: "title": "Page Title"
description: Text values must be in double quotes
searchText: "title": "page title" text values must be in double quotes

title: "visible": true
description: Boolean values (true/false) have no quotes
searchText: "visible": true boolean values (true/false) have no quotes

title: "year": "2025"
description: Numbers can be in quotes for consistency
searchText: "year": "2025" numbers can be in quotes for consistency

title: ["item1", "item2", "item3"]
description: Arrays (lists) use square brackets [ ]
searchText: ["item1", "item2", "item3"] arrays (lists) use square brackets [ ]

title: Comma Rules
description: Put commas after each item, EXCEPT the last item in a list
searchText: comma rules put commas after each item, except the last item in a list

description: Objects in arrays - note NO comma after the last object

searchText: git status check what files you've changed

searchText: git log --oneline -5 see recent changes to the website

title: git stash
description: Temporarily save your changes without committing (useful before git pull)
searchText: git stash temporarily save your changes without committing (useful before git pull)

description: Restore your temporarily saved changes
searchText: git stash pop restore your temporarily saved changes

title: git stash clear
description: Delete all temporarily saved changes (use carefully!)
searchText: git stash clear delete all temporarily saved changes (use carefully!)

description: See exactly what you've changed in files
searchText: git diff see exactly what you've changed in files

description: Undo changes to a specific file (revert to last saved version)
searchText: git checkout -- filename.json undo changes to a specific file (revert to last saved version)

title: git revert HEAD
description: Undo the last commit (creates a new commit that undoes changes)
searchText: git revert head undo the last commit (creates a new commit that undoes changes)

<script type="application/ld+json">
{

description: Website schema with search functionality
searchText:
<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "website",
  "name": "site name",
  "url": "https://example.com",
  "potentialaction": {
    "@type": "searchaction",
    "target": "https://example.com/search?q={search_term_string}",
    "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
  }
}
</script> website schema with search functionality
